Side Effects: Bruising on stomach. Knots and build up of medicine that eventually went away. Nausea after taking the shot.
Comments: I am taking lovenox the rest of my life. It may not be ideal but when I was taking warfarin I lost my memory_ hair_ and I had a hard time forming sentences. I'd rather take lovenox than be on rat poison.

Side Effects: Frequent migraines exhausted all the time nausea upset stomach weak  badly brushing & huge knots just felt very badly all the time沽｢

Massive hematoma on belly_ covering left to right side and 6" wide. Extreme nausea_ headaches_ dizziness_ stomach aches. After 4 months I am still_ daily_ effected by this medication with severe stomach upsets.
Comments: Nobody in the hospital asked me how I react to medicines_ was never given any options. Nobody noticed how sick Lovenox was making me. The pharmaceutical company should have a law suit filed against them.

Side Effects: Had compartment syndrome in left leg.  More surgery.  Went off Lovenox then was told to go back on_ hematoma in right leg size of entire top and sises of thigh.  Anemic.  Am not on Lovenox anymore.  This is a dangerous drug and should be studied further  Also banned in Europe due to severe side effects.
Stinging after the med is injected for a full minute; huge_ fist sized purple/black/red bruises; severe nausea at first_ but got better after about a month.

Reason: blood clot in right atrium on port
Side Effects: I am new to this drug but not to giving myself shots. I have been on methotrexate injections for several years 1 time a week.I also have been on several self injectable biological drugs for my ra. But NEVER and I do mean NEVER have i had knots with pain & bruises like this! Tgey are to the point I literally cry because they hurt so bad.
Lightheaded_ fatigue and nausea . I took lovenox throughout my first pregnant for almost a year.

Reason: factor v/ pregnant and on bedrest!
Side Effects: very bad bruising_ got a very very bad rash on the sides i put the injection on... the medicineis the bad part_ the shot itself is ok but when it goes in it stings!!!!! like a bee!!! i developed a very bad rash not only around my stomach where i give myself the shot but around my breasts too...and i know its the shots cause i had no problem before!!! im currently 21 weeks pregnant and hoping for a happy ending since i come from a history of 6 miscarriages and lovenox is supposed to stop that..i had never gotten so far!!! i also think im loosing weight but thats good!!!

Football sized hematoma_ anemia knots all over stomach painful had to be hospitalized_ cellulitis symptoms but don't think I have it_ now my skin is turning purplish black after bruising went away and scared my skin is dying
No side effects so far  but the burning after the injection is terrible.

Reason: DVT AND PE AND FACTOR V
Side Effects: Bruising and nodulers under skin where injections were given ...
mild pain with injections_ bruising at site_ recently oozing from site
Comments: First pregnancy ended at 29 weeks with myself almost dying due to HELLP and PRE-E_ son was born extremely small and spent 3 mths in hospital. I am currently 36 weeks pregnant and don't believe that would have happened without Lovenox

Side Effects: Massive hematomas_ damage to liver and grossly enlarged pancreas_ price is outrageous!!  I have hereditary elevated factor VIII_ Coumadin resistant.  Had to go off lovenox due to abn numbers from kidney functions.  I feel like a walking time bomb!!
BLOODY urine for 5 days and almost had kidney failure_ ending up in surgery with 2 stents from my kidneys to my bladder!!!!! HORRIBLE!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reason: My mom was taking it aft knee repla
Side Effects: My mother had Heparin Induced Thrombocytopenia AND Cerebral Venous Sinus Thrombosis after 10 doses of Lovenox!  She almost died.  Only 10 reported cases of this in American Medical Journals-only one to a replacement patient-hip-69 years old and she died!  My mother is the only living knee replacement patient to have survived it!  She has been on Arixtra for 4 months.
Comments: Even though it is rare-people are allergic to Lovenox/Heparin and if they are it most often is fatal!  Watch for headaches_ nausea_ vomiting after you start taking it!!!

Side Effects: Stinging sensation_light bruising. mild headaches. Injecting slowlyeases the pain. Night sweats.

Reason: FVL_ Lupus Anticoag_ DVT_ Double PE
Side Effects: Slight bruising at some injection site_ patient error from clutching skin too tight. Slight taste In mouth while injecting. No other side effects. Warfarin user for 10 years_ switched to Lovenox because pt/inr would not stay normal. Was getting blood drawn every week. Since off warfarin not tired all the time and feel better in general.
Intense burning sensation and pain during shot and for several minutes after_ don't know how I can do this for 6 months_ so far only light headedness followed by shot

Nausea_vomiting_headache_lightheaded_blackout spells_ bruising_ weakness_ bruising at injection site with hematomas_ eye sight loss from headaches_ hemorrhaging  from female area_nose and throat_ chills and couldn't keep warm and blood was way too thin!

Extreme hematomas_ pain_ and tenderness at the injection site. Have had to receive stitches for severe bleeding at injection site.  Mild nausea and vomiting. I was on arixtra for almost 2 years with no problems_ due to not becoming therapeutic on warfarin 6 months prior. Arixtra was perfect for me and the reason I had to switch to lovenox was due to my pregnancy. I have had 3dvts in my legs_ and 1 massive dvt on my ovary_ all of which while taking warfarin. I would recommend arixtra to anyone currently on lovenox because of less side effects. As I became further along in my pregnancy_ pinching skin was harder than ever_ and I was allowed other injection sites besides my stomach_ but with the same results_ horrible hematomas that required stitches. Very disapointed with this drug_ mainly because I've seen how blood thinners don't have to interfere with your daily life. For everyone who reads this and is dissatisfied with lovenox_ but doesnt know of anything better_ ask your doctor about arixtra!
Stinging at time of injection and up to 5 minutes afterwards.brusing_ some small bleeding at injection site afterwards.
Comments: I could not take Warfarin because of the bad headaches_ dizzy/foggyness as well as chest pains_ muscle aches. Switched to Lovenox 14 days ago and while it's not fun to inject shots 2 times a day_ I don't have the same symptoms I had on the Warfarin. I still get the slight headaches once in awhile and a little foggyness at times from the shots.  I also feel bloated from the shots.  Drink a lot of water and the headaches and bloated feeling goes away.  I hope to only be on these shots 3 more months.

Side Effects: Pain at the injection site_  knots_  tenderness_
Stinging sensation during injection and for a few minutes after.  Slight bruising at injection site.
stinging during and after administering shot.  Some bruising_ one bad hematoma.  Very helpful advice on this site on how to administer shot and avoid some of the pain.  Thanks!
Comments: I am warfarin resistant so this is my only option.  No bad side effects.  Don't love the shots but can easily deal with them.  I'll be on lovenox for 3 months then not sure.

Side Effects: Stinging sensation during injection and a full minute afterwards.  Bruising.
Comments: I'm not a fan of injecting myself twice a day but it has made a world of difference in my life.  I was on Coumadin for 2 1/2 months and could not function I was so fatigued and foggy.  I FINALLY feel like myself again_ first time in almost 3 months.

Reason: DVT + Coumadin failure and new PE
Side Effects: The nausea I struggled with in the beginning is now just an occasional nuisance. Other than a bruise now and then_ I no longer experience any regular side-effects with Lovenox.
Slight bruising at injection site
Comments: I had an allergic reaction to coumadin and taking Lovenox is my only option for right now until other drugs are approved for use in DVT cases.  It does not give me any side effects_ I just wish it were covered a little more by my insurance.

Side Effects: My wife was put on lovenox during her pregnancy_ because she had a blood clot in her leg 20 years earlier.  When she was 7.5 months pregnant_ she died of a brain aneurysm.  The doctors are pretty coy about what role the blood thinner played_ but I cannot help but think that she would not have internally bled to death without the blood thinners.
Comments: Even with the lovenox_ my wife had a miscarriage a year before the pregnancy where lovenox participated in her bleeding to death.

Side Effects: Slight injection site tenderness.  Switched from Coumadin when my hair was becoming brittle and significantly  falling out.  After 3 weeks off Coumadin my hair has stopped falling out and texture is almost back to normal.  I will put up with injections forever in order to keep my hair!
Bruising at sites-MAJOR body aches and very low energy.
Just bruising taking the shot is like breathing now very easy
Comments: I feel the lovenox has saved my life..4 blood clots in my right leg PE in right lung..clot in my vena cava now have greenfield filter..Lovenox makes me.feel safe

Side Effects: pain during injection_ bruising_ occasional knots under injection site
Comments: i have not had any additional side effects whatsoever and don't think i was even aware that there were any likely "extra" side effects besides the injection issues.  i took this my entire first pregnancy without complication as well_ and was so very grateful for it since it allowed me a successful pregnancy unlike earlier miscarriages.

Side Effects: Burning during & after injection.  Some bruising depending on where administered.  Sensitive skin for about an hour after injection.  Some tummy issues_ not sure if it is the Lovenox or pregnancy.
Comments: So far this isn't the worst thing I have ever been prescribed_ but I am not a fan of injecting myself semi-long term.  I am pregnant and found out about half way in I am heterozygous FVL_ no previous clots_ but family history.  So I was put on purely as a precaution.

Side Effects: Nausea and diarrhea_ bad headaches_ bruising and pain at injection sites.
Comments: I am thrilled that the pain in my leg is gone (the DVT was extremely painful) but dealing with the side effects stinks.  I feel wiped out_ very sick to my stomach_ and the headaches sometimes leave me in tears.  I'll have to take this until my pregnancy is over_ so it feels like the longest pregnancy ever_ but I'm happy to not be in the pain from my leg.

Side Effects: Weakness_ dizziness_ nausea (eating makes this better_ not worse)_ headaches
Comments: Injecting myself is no fun_ but considering that a CT scan had already shown some clots in the lungs_ I don't have much choice_ as ankle surgery remains a possibility (so no Coumadin -- yet).  As my mother said (regarding her cancer treatment)_ "it beats the alternative."  Glad to see that others have same symptoms_ not all of which are listed by manufacturer.

Side Effects: The first week I felt very dizzy and I got headaches. I felt weak. Now_ I`m okay_ just a slight sting after the injection and bruising on the stomach.
Comments: I hate putting this stuff into my body_ before this I was on cumadine and that was no better. Wish everyone good life and strong health who has to take this drug. It`s not easy. Hang in there:)

Side Effects: Burning_ itching_ bruising_ lumps at injection site.  I dry the alcohol at the site with a hair dryer before the injection and that seems to help.
Comments: 9 weeks into a very small dose of estrogen (HRT)_ I had permanent vision loss due to a central retinal artery occlusion.  Much testing revealed high levels of lupus anticoagulant antibodies.  I fall a lot because I've lost my depth perception and that leads to bruising_ but the bruising isn't outrageous on the lovenox.  Supposedly I'll be on the lovenox for life.

Side Effects: Lumps_ black and blue_ and itching at injection site_ very uncomfortable.
Pain at injection site_ painfull burning and irritation of the injection site_tenderness_ red rashes_mild bruising_vomiting_ loose stools_ shakes_ dizziness_ and head aches_
Comments: I was diagnosed with a Pulminary Embolis in September of 2010_ I have been on the shots on and off the entire time and befor the pregnancy I was on the cumidin and the lovenox.  Doctors took me off of the cumidin due to it is unsafe for the baby.  I have had miscariages in the past but the doctors didn't do any test to know the cause they just said a force of nature_ this is my 7th pregnancy and only 3 living. I am 12 weeks so far and no problems.  I had my miscariages up to my 11th week.  I've got good doctors and looking for the best.

Side Effects: my husband_ who vets his own cattle_ administered the shots and did a stellar job. I didn't feel them. Only tiny bruises ocassionally.
In the past two months_ have been prescribed to take twice daily; stop Coumadin. Further past_ have taken on/off when Coumadin has been unsuccessful and/or when preparing for a medical procedure.
Comments: Currently_ I am having tingling_ numbness in my spine_ arms and legs_ huge hematomas at injection sites_ pressure in my lower adbdomen. I feel more uncomfortable with twice daily long term Lovenox than on Coumadin.

Side Effects: constant diarrhea yellow bile_ have developed osteopenia and have had broken ribs_ arm and now L1 2 3 4 5 are messed up. take infusion for osteoprosis doesnt wk. feel like crap all the time. bed ridden lots of the time. thyroid problems_ virtigo_ grummpy_ sad. pissed off. coumidin resestant more pissed. I went all the way to UVA to see a specialist. I''m from tex. cost me tons thought I got answers. she said go back on coumidin sence havent had clot in couple of yrs. ( have trapeze filter)  idea was when inr reached 2.5 I could go off shot and take coumidin inr would only reach 1.1. even on legal highest dose.  Just last week found 2 superficial clots left ankle. but back is killing me can't sit down at all have to stand or lie down. Im wondering that it is the shots_ I am so sick of this sometimes just want it all to stop. all the dr.s do is give me more pills like last wk.;pills for pancreas for stool prob. they make me sick. heart rate to high so pills 4 that_ makes heart flutter an
Comments: saved me at first_ now_ killing me slowly

Side Effects: Just a burning sensation the entire time the drug is being administered.  The needled doesn't hurt.  Just the drug itself.  Minimal bruising (so far).
Comments: I found it helps out with minimizing the bruising if you sit down_ grab your stomach fat and put the needle in at a 90 degree angle vs. laying down and doing it.I miscarried after 3 months and the oncologist is hoping that this will help.  I knew I had factor V_ but didn't know about the other one until he retested me for a bunch.  It's super important you have them check you for multiple blood clotting disorders_ especially if you're trying to get pregnant.  Cross you fingers for me :)

Side Effects: Severe burning at injection site followed by a skin rash. Burning continued and rash grew larger and itching began.
Comments: I have no history of clots or high blood pressure. After three days of intense burning_ rash and itch I refused injections.If you need it take it.  In my case it appears the hospital was pushing lovenox to raise my bill.

Side Effects: I hit 2 threshholds.1) after 4 doses (spaced at 12 hrs.)-chills_ nasuea_ joint pain_confusion_ balance problems. To continue taking I spaced at 18 hrs.beginning w/the fifth dose. 2)at 2 weeks (spaced at 18 hrs.) experienced intense arthritis throughout my body. Have continued with 24 hr spacing.
Comments: I also have had bruising_ headaches and fatigue. This drug has a half life of 12 hours and stays in an average person's body for 96 hrs.or more. so each additional dose increases the concentration. Spacing more than 12 hrs kept the level from getting toxic for me.

Side Effects: Bruising_ headache.  But the worst side effect by far_ for me was the allergic rash I started getting on the 4th day.  Itchy red rash_ worse all over abdomen_ spreading to my scalp_ legs_ arms_ crotch...horrible!
Comments: The rash went away within two days after stopping Lovenox.  Luckily my INR was in therapeutic range and I will be able to continue on Coumadin only.  My fear is that I will develop another clot...hope I am not allergic to drugs similar to Lovenox(like heparin).  The injections were not pleasant.  But they saved my life as my right lung was not functional due to the pulmonary emboli(multiple blood clots in lung).

Side Effects: Migraines... I wake up every day with a horrible headache_ and usually get at least one more during the day. Doc gave me Fiorecet to help and so long as I take that_ I don't notice any other side effects.
Comments: Since I'm taking this postpartum_ there is enough fat in my belly that I don't really feel the injection or burning_ though occasionally it will really get my attention.

Side Effects: Headache. Slight redness at injection sites
black and blue_ itching_ heaviness in legs

Bruising_ hematomas_ soreness until I experimented and became adept at giving myself the shots. Anyone who complains of these things would be wise to experiment and ask several nurses to demonstrate proper technique. I noticed someone here saying things improved for them AFTER they began pinching the skin while giving the injection. No subcutaneous should EVER be given without pinching the site. There's no way to avoid bruising and huge lumps if you aren't pinching the skin at the injection site. Those who complain of the liquid being "painful" need to pinch tighter.  Done correctly_ there is virtually no pain associated with this injection unless you happen to hit some nerves.  In this case_ pull out and move slightly.
Comments: Give the injection slowly. Count to 30 quickly while giving the injection slowly -- very slowly. Always pinch the skin. When finished_ hold the needle where it is and count to 5 quickly.  Pull it out a little and count to 10 quickly.  Then slowly remove it the rest of the way.  NEVER rub the injection site BEFORE or AFTER giving yourself the injection.  You'll bruise heavily_ get hematomas_ and experience pain as a result.  This really should be no big deal. If it is_ you're doing it wrong.

Side Effects: burns during injection_ lots of bruising & hard knots at injection sites
Comments: After losing 4 children during pregnancy_ and having 2 successfully with this drug_ I think it is a miracle.  Wish they could make it cheaper with less pain and bruising_ but that's nothing if it means having living-breathing children.

Side Effects: Some nausea_ diarrhea_ slight headache_ minor sting in the injection site and bruising.
Comments: I would rather not take it.  Main thing I feel is like a light case of the flu.

Side Effects: Bruising_ stinging_ headaches
Comments: Still do not have a cause for the DVT_ which is over 2 feet long. Still testing. Shots are kind of a hassle with school.

Side Effects: bruising_ stinging when injecing_ some bleeding when injecting_ some headaches and grumpiness.
Comments: I developed left ovarian thrombosis post-partum and was in the hospital twice. We did a second CT after 30 days and found a significant reduction in size but are continuing the shots twice daily for another 30 days with another CT to make sure that the clot is completely gone.

Side Effects: Headaches (cured by walking & eating ice chips)_ bruising_ & hard knots at the injection site
Comments: I lost my first child & if I would not have been admitted for a rare blood disorder than I may have lost the present baby due to blood clots; the doctor's found the 2 mutated genes for blood clots and immediately put me on the injection of 70 & I am alive again...I am able to walk for almost an hour_ work a full shift and eat.  My fiance administers the shot and yes it does hurt_ but I love not having to worry about loosing my son

Side Effects: Purple/blue bruising and large hardened lumps at some injection site. Pain when plunger pushed down on syringe and drug released into skin. Slightly more rapid heartbeat 10 mins or so after injection - could be anxiety/paranoia? Tiny bit of bleeding after injecting.
Comments: DVT after longhaul flight from Hawaii_ to London Heathrow_ then Newcastle in close succession_ had recently taken birth control pill dianette at time. Now pregnant Lovenox offered as precaution given my history. Instructed to inject on side of thigh_ not belly- started treatment at 23 weeks pregnant and will continue until 24 hrs before birth and afterwards also I expect as post=partum DVT just as much as a risk I heard. Concerned about getting an epidural while on Lovenox as I heard this can cause serious bad side effects if the two are combined..any know about this?

Side Effects: Mild bruising at injection sites; burning sensation after injection; lethargic; lack of normal appetite; muscular throbbing/aching in chest and back
Comments: I have had two DVTs in the past two years. Currently on coumadin_ which I love. No side effects. During my second DVT I was on Lovenox for almost 8 weeks and felt horrible. I am looking to get pregnant in the next year and fearful of the side effects from lovenox again. My dr. recommended Fragmin could be an alternative_ but I can't find much about this drug and if it will cause the same side effects as the lovenox.

Side Effects: Hard to separate from post-surgery anemia_ but did have extreme fatigue throughout treatment.
Comments: Used ice pack to dull the post stick stinging which is quite noticeable.  Also had headache.

Side Effects: I have been very tired ever since taking the shots.  Irritable and almost short tempered.  I have been very gasy and have had some stomach discomfort.  Black and Blues at point of puncture small lumps at injection site.
Comments: I have a rare blood dissorder where the blood clots in my veins.  It is called "Anticardio Phospholipid Syndrome" and is also called "APS"  "Antiphospholipid Antibody Syndrome".   It is an auto imude disease where the body fightes against itself.   I am currently taking 15mg of coumadin daily as well along with the Lovenox 100mg twice a day.  We are having a difficult time making my blood levels theraputic.I noticed if you ice the area down before and after the needle it hurts much less and the stingy doesn't last as long.

Side Effects: I dont feel anything like myself_ low energy_ Axienty_ cant sleep at night(dont go to bed till about 1 a.m.)_ sore stomach_ the injections hurt because of how thick the liquid is_ when you clean the area with the alcohol let the area dry first before injecting_ it wont hurt as much.  I am also on Coumadin taking 15mg a day regardless of if I have to give myself shots
Comments: Because i have a rare blood disorder (less then 1% of the population have it) i am required to have my INR tested twice a week right now_ when its where it should be i dont have to give myself shots_ but i find the side effects are more apparent_ i have only been off them for a day so far_ next week i go back to get my blood tested to see if my INR is still where it should be if not i have to take shots_ Im taking Coumadin as well and it seems that when im not on the shots the symptoms are worse.  I am a Lifer of these two drugs_ something im going to look into is a Homeopathy item called ARNICA MOTANA_ its made from a plant and when taken oraly it CAN help with blood clots and work with Coumadin_ im going to take what i found to my Doctor and get his take on it. Who knows if it will help but what the hell right?

Side Effects: large bruising_ hard knots_ stinging during and after injection
Comments: was admitted to hospital postpartum with pain in my left side due to left ovarian thrombosis_ was in hospital for about 7days on antibiotics and heperan_ sent me home on 100mg of lovenox every 12 hrs for 8 days also taking warfarin daily for the next 6 months

Reason: Factor V Leiden_ PE right lung
Side Effects: tiny bruises around injection site_ constant diarrhea_ HEADACHES that seem to never go away_ burning/stinging after medicine is injected_ hot/cold flashes_ an itch as the medicine moves through my body_ mood swings_ fatigue_ skin is very sensitive.
Comments: i went to the ER complaining of chest pains and difficulty breathing. once tested (xray_ ekg_ cat scan) they diagnosed me with a pulmonary embolism. they assured me it was treatable and that we had caught it in time. they told me if i had waited 2 more days_ i would have died. at 17_ thats a scary thought. so i have been on lovenox shots for almost 1 month and i do not enjoy the injections_ but i dont really mind them. they are tiny needles and dont really cause that much pain.

Side Effects: bruising_ hard lumps_
Comments: I had a blood clot in my artery behind my knee in my right leg.  Dr. removed it and put me on Coumidan.  About 3 wks later developed blood clot same place.  Dr said he was going to take my leg off 2 inches above my knee.  I said I wanted a second opinion.  Went to Baylor in Dallas.  Diagnosed with APS.  Dr put me on Lovenox injections every 12 hrs.  Took blood clot out and took vein from left leg and placed in right leg...also had to have my big toe amputated_ due to lack of circulation.  Haven't had ANY problems since.  I feel VERY blessed!  Feel free to contact me!

Side Effects: occasional pain/stinging at injection site_ bruising_ nausea when upping the dose
Comments: This was a relatively easy way to treat my blood clotting disorder during pregnancy/postpartum.  No monitoring needed_ which was nice_ although it is very expensive.  No problems with delivery - stopped the shots 24 hours before an induction and was on them again twelve hours after delivery.

Side Effects: Just prior to cardioversion because of my atrial fibrillation_ the doctor discovered that my INR was too low_ so I received two Lovenox injections in my stomach_ quite painful and caused bruising_ and then I had to give myself injections afterwards at home_ too.  Nothing I would ever want to do for long.  Had a trans-esophageal echocardiogram prior to the cardioversion and somehow my tongue was traumatized (it looked like I may have badly bitten it somehow_ but I was under Twilight anaesthetic) and due to the thinned blood_ I bled profusely INTO my tongue and the next day after I got home it looked like a killer whale filling up the whole inside of my mouth (my tongue was black and blue and HUGELY swollen).  I went to the ER and the doctor said this was life-threatening_ because the swelling tongue could block my airway.  However_ it stopped short of that.  It was a horrible thing to experience_ very frightening and prevented me from eating any solid food (there was no room in my mouth
Comments: I downgraded the score to a 4 because even though it did exactly what it was supposed to do_ I definitely didn't like the idea of having to inject myself with it.  And it leaves bad bruises_ but they do heal.

Side Effects: I don't know if it was encouraged but became mildly depressed as well as postpartum anxiety which I am still experiencing.  I was on 60 mg twice a day_ I experienced some severe bruising as well as hard fluid collections under the skin (those took several months to subside.)
Comments: If I choose to have another child I will probably be on lovenox the entire pregnancy.

Side Effects: Help!!!   Does anyone get anxious when taking this drug? I don't have tolerance for ignorant people and I'm getting shopping cart rage. When I was on this drug two years ago I felt this way but I wasnﾂ稚 sure if it was due to giving birth and having the large DVT.  Now that Iﾂ知 on the drug again (so that I can have another child)_ Iﾂ知 feeling the same symptoms.  Iﾂ知 not sure if Iﾂ値l be able to handle this drug much longer!

EXPENSIVE and pain at injection site for a few minutes. That's about it. Am currently transitioning over to Coumadin and am having major side effects from that. Lovenox is such an easier alternative_ I will miss it_ my insurance won't cover it anymore ;(
Comments: Been on it for 6 months_ 1st few weeks really seemed like a pain and literally was painful. But I got used to it quickly and doesn't bother me at all now. Gives  me great relief to not have to worry about clots anymore.

Side Effects: Fatigue_ shortness of breath_ tired_ headaches that can last days or a few minutes_ anxiety_ irritability_ sweating
Comments: I got multiple pe's in my right lung in 06. Was on lovenox for a few months after_ then switched to coumadin. I preferred the coumadin over the shots_ but hated the restrictions on my diet and weekly monitoring. Being on lovenox is great because of the lack of monitoring and diet control. But the pain can be unbearable. I am back on lovenox due to being pregnant and with my belly getting bigger I am freaking out as to where to do it next?!? I tried a different method of injection where you clear out bubble_ tighten the skin (with index and thumb) and inject slowly the only pain afterwards was the injection site_ unlike many other times having pain from the medication or hematomas etc. So far seems easier to find good spots this way.. hopefully it will continue for the next 5 months that is all I have left to be on this. Yeah!

Side Effects: Low energy_ extremely awful sinus congestion-my nasal passages have been swollen since I started treatment_ along with nose constantly running-can't breath through nose at all(I've never had a cold this bad before)_ always tired since taking_ mild to painful headaches_ don't feel well for a while after taking_ rapid heartbeat and anxiety shortly after taking_ very light brusing to none at injection site-painful to touch the next day sometimes though and sometimes not. Freezing a washcloth and holding to site before giving shot and after helps with pain and brusing.
Comments: I lost a baby in the past at full term_ they think being due to a gene mutation with my blood clotting. So to be careful I don't lose this one they have put me on Lovenox 40mg everyday_ on top of a baby asprin of 81mg a day_ 3 doses of calcium and vitamin d a day_ and my prenatal vitamins. The shot doesn't hurt going in just the medicine hurts-like a bee sting-going in. Sometimes I have no brusing and sometimes only light brusing_ sometimes it never hurts to touch the area the day after and other times it does. This is my third pregnancy and it has been the best pregnancy I have ever had-I always felt great and wonderful. After starting these shots though I feel tired_ no energy_ mild to painful headaches_ don't feel well for hours after taking shot_ rapid heartbeat after taking shot_ anxiety after taking shot_ but worst of all my nasal passages are swollen and blocking so I can't breath at all-on top of my nose constantly running-severe mucus. I could handle all these side effects and

Side Effects: low energy -- not able to run as long/fast or weight lift as much_ coughing with mild congestion_ decreased libido (no sex drive)_ loose stool_ feels like having a weak bladder at times
Comments: Shots caused bruising with hard lumps (clots) under the injection site. Doctor says no danger of clots spreading into bloodstream_ as they aren't that kind of clot.

Side Effects: Headache_ diarrhea.  Low grade fever_ probably not related to Lovenox.
Comments: I now use lovenox when flying over 2 hrs in distance_ this is the first time post surgery. I have a protein S deficiency and a PE dx post partum almost 3 yrs ago.  Convenient prefilled dispensing which I like compared to sub cutaneous heparin and oral coumadin_ both I have done for long periods of time during and after multiple pregnancies. I use ice before doing the shot.  All stomach sub cutaneous shots_ I also ice afterwards if possible.  Bruising minimal at best.  I have woken with headaches every day of use and have had several episodes of significant diarrhea_ this is the highest dose I have used at .4 vs .3.  I removed the air from the chamber before injecting lovenox_ but was not clear if this was necessary.  Also really liked the no recapping and the needle guard that is easily engaged post shot by following the instructions.  Would use this again.  Easy to travel with.

Side Effects: Fatigue_ hurts for probably 5minutes_ bruising
Comments: I just started this treatment so I can't tell if it's working yet

Side Effects: Bruising_ pea-sized solid red to purple "dots" around the injection site.
Comments: Has anyone come across any information about consumption of alchohol while using Lovenox? I'm trying to convince my husband not to drink alcohol on Halloween_ but he insists it is safe. I cannot find any research to back me up that alcohol and Lovenox (in particular) don't mix_ although there are plenty of warnings about oral blood thinners (coumadin_ heparin_ ect.) Any help is appreciated!

Side Effects: PAINFULL for approx. 10mins after injection!!  Did not expect that!!  Just took first dose.  I'm sure it's doing what it's supposed to do.
Fatigue_ shortness of breath_ and bruising.
Comments: The side effects are bothersome but this medicine has allowed me to take a medicine for my cancer that I would not have been able to take otherwise.  I too also wish this was in pill form.

Side Effects: Very few bruises but when I do bruise they are very large_ a few hard bumps_ loose stool_ overall weakness/fatigue_ burning. To lessen the burn I inject lovenox VERY slowly (if you don't have steady hands don't try it). Sometimes the syringes aren't sharp enough and the skin is hard to puncture. My doctors did not warn me of any of the side effects prior to me starting lovenox_ they just said some people have very strong reactions and some people have little to no reactions while on lovenox and never said what possible reactions were.
Comments: I was taking warfarin but never had a stable INR and developed a PE when my INR was 4.0 so I will most likely be a lovenox lifer. Compared to coumadin/warfarin I prefer lovenox because it does not have the numerous drug interactions_ its pregnancy safe and doesn't require as much monitoring. Lovenox can be a much stronger anticoagulant than coumadin and isn't easily reversed if your blood is too thin (i.e You can't just take vitamin K or be given FFP like you can with coumadin if your too thin) . When taking ANY anticoag WATCH FOR SIGNS OF INTERNAL BLEEDING!!! ( Bloody urine_ tarry/black stool_ vomiting blood_ etc.) Anyone wanting to talk PLEASE CONTACT ME. I'm heterozygous for FVL_ have another blood clotting related antibody affecting me (they haven't figure out what yet)_ I've had a PE in my lower right lobe_ 3 CVTs (superior sagittal sinus_ transverse sinus and sigmoid sinus). Coumadin failed after 8 months and I'm now on lovenox. Please contact me if you want to talk_ not only

Side Effects: pain and discoloration at injection site_ hard nodules under skin_ loss of energy_ anxiety_ loss of bladder control
Comments: I didn't suspect the lovenox as the cause of energy loss_ anxiety_ and bladder problems.  But as soon as my course of treatment was over_ two of the three cleared up. I can only hope that the third one will too!  Now on Warfarin_ I don't really know how effective the lovenox was. I just know I feel a whole lot better without it.

Side Effects: I developed a DVT in my R lower calf in my sleep during a long haul flight. I was now in Sydney and began with Clexane injections which it's called here Lovenox. It helped getting rid of the pain in my calf immediatly....but I adopted other symptoms which I've never had before. I'm very fit. The symptoms are:- Headaches_tiredness_sleepy_fatigue_a nasty taste in my mouth_shortness of breath_over all not feeling well and sure not feeling like myself_sweats_my body just doesn't want to move(I'm very atheletic) been on this injections HAS made a huge difference to my energy levels. At first I was OK with the injections_ it was easier because your doses are correct for your body weight without having to do blood work all the time. The Dr. here in the States have just started me on Coumadin/Warfrin which I'm hoping will make me feel better even though blood work will be required 2x per week then once a week to 10 days.....neither are great but treatment is neccessary.It is very important NOT
Comments: Clexane/lovenox injectables are painful! The Dr. told me "no big deal it doesn't hurt" or "any side effects" but there is. It burns badly like a bee sting. It's not the injection or the needle part it the fluid that goes in. Let the air out first of your injection(even thought they tell us not to) it helps a lot....pinch the site/fat on your stomach and at 90 degrees injected the site then release the skin once the needle is in  slowly push the fluid in. Put compression immediatetly on the site once injection is removed...if you try and walk immediatly it may really hurst even more as you can feel the fluid moving into a certain area depending how close to the hip or belly button you are_ give yourself a little time....it's unpleasant! At first I was OK with it but after almost 2 months of shoots everyday my tolenrance has became lower_ I have bruising with some of the shoots but usually just a spot where the injection has gone in. I did get once a very bad heamatom

Side Effects: Feel jittery_ shaky and anxious. Diarrhea. Injections are painless_ minimal bruising.
Comments: I don't really know about the effectiveness of the drug. I have had other knee replacements but this is the first time I have had to use these shots. I don't have a problem with the shots_ but I feel awful. I shake and feel anxious all of the time.

Side Effects: Brusing_ nose bleeds_ headaches_ pain at injection site_ nausea_ decreased bone density_
Comments: I take this medication twice a day everyday and have been for a little over 2 years.. At times it can be very painful but it has saved my life!! I couldn't remain theraputic with coumadin and continued to get clots.. so this was a last resort!! It's the only medication that has kept my disease from progressing..

Side Effects: Bruising at injection sites; some injection sites have hard area;  tiredness which may be from decreased activity due to DVT;
Comments: Leg had swollen to bursting point when doctor started lovenox injections.  Pain intensity began dropping overnight.  Swelling is down considerably after 20 days of injections.  Added oral Coumadin over past 2 weeks.  Don't care for the injections but I think this drug saved my life and prevented a PE.

Side Effects: Nausea_ loose BM..but that could be from the Pregnancy & prenatal pills.
Comments: The shots are too bad_ I have found that if I don't "rub" the injection site afterwards_ that I don't bruise too badly.  I gave myself a shot in the leg once and that hurt very badly! I will stick w/ the stomach shots. The needles are very very sharp!

Side Effects: large bruising_ stinging at injection site_ hard lumps at injection site_ decreased platelet count
Comments: I am on Lovenox due to FVL and FII Prothrombin. I have hx of fetal loss_ PE_ and DVT with first pregnancy. I am now on the Lovenox b/c I am pregnant again. If you are not pregnant_ you might want to ask your doctor about "Arixtra" instead. It is a 1x daily shot instead of 2 and I had no bruising or stinging with it. It is not recommended with pregnancy though.

Side Effects: bruising_ headaches
Comments: This has helped the shots be more bearable.1. Use ICE to numb the area for 5 min prior to shot! (At times I don't even feel the shot and I don't have stinging anymore).2. Use a tight pinch to inject.3. Apply PRESSURE for a few minutes after the shot.4. Put the bandaid on TIGHT. (For some reason this keeps from bruising as much. Also_ if I miss the bandaid_ I tend to bleed hours later after the shot was given.Hope this helps!

Side Effects: So far I have experienced some burning after injection and some large bruising (not alot) and knots.
Comments: I have had 2 normal pregnancies and then a third one ended in a 17 wk. miscarriage.  They discovered I have Antiphospholipid Syndrome.  I am at 15 wks now and have beed taking the shots for almost 30 days.  So far_ I have had a couple of really bad bruises and some burning at injection site.  Burning has gotten increasingly better.  Definitely helps to release the air before giving the shot.  Overall_ I hate having to give myself shots_ but it is well worth it and so far is going well.

Side Effects: I had gallbladder surgery january 2005. I have had painful inflammation that has resulted in 40lbs of swelling on my abdomen caused by the shots.  the drs dont know what to do for me.  I am bed ridden and in so much pain constantly.
Comments: I have been to over 25 doctors and everyone says it cant be from the shots because it has to be out of my system but it happened immediatley after the shots and hasnt stopped.  I have had so many medical problems happen i cant even list them all.  when i called Lovenox..the customer service problem said yes this can happen but arent you glad you didnt get a blood clot! i was furious!!  I have no life and I am only 45

Side Effects: bruising at injection site at first; after a couple of months I did not bruise every time; bruised more easily while pg
Comments: Compared to my previous pregnancy before my FVL diagnosis_ this one was wonderful. Lovenox made all the difference and helped me have a healthy full term pregnancy this time.

Side Effects: bruising_ blood taste in mouth_ stinging_ HEADACHES
Comments: was on coumadin but can't stay at a theraputic rate_ frustrated by painful shots

Side Effects: Pain & swelling at injection site_ bruising_feeling very tired like getting sick_headache_possible depression
Comments: 100mg _twice daily

Side Effects: I've been taking it for 12 days now after surgery_ have to put shots in my thighs because of hysterectomy_ have bruises on some injection sites_ have sound in my left ear (knocking)_ feel wobbly sometimes right after I give myself the shot
Comments: I take the air out of the shots otherwise it burns too much_ needles are very sharp_

Side Effects: Nauseous_ very anxious_ constant low grade headaches everyday_ migraines_ can not sleep at night_ feels like my insides are like jello_ feel my heart beating in my chest.
Comments: I am on a high dose of lovenox at 80mg once a day to help prevent a blood clot in my broken leg that i had a former blood clot in years ago..I was on 80mg twice a day and i felt like i was going to die!...horrible feeling!...i dont ever see many of my side effects listed and wonder if anyone else is experiencing the same feelings i am?  The doctor doesnt seem to acknowledge why i feel like this.

Side Effects: VERY SEVERE PAIN  BURNING  SWELLING AND BRUISING

I've read all the comments to date.  No one mentioned bloody urine as a side effect.   On my fifth day I awoke to a toilet bowl full of what looked like beet juice!  Where did that blood come from.  My doctor recommended that I finish my "course' of four more injections_ but I chose not to since I was also having mild stomach discomfort.   After skipping the a.m. injection_ by noon my urine returned to normal.   Most of my injection sites developed a small bruise_ but one turned into an eggplant sized and colored bruise that expanded even more as it began to fade.

I was unable to inject into stomache so injected into back of arms and into upper fatty part of thigh and am experiencing sharp shooting horrible pains down leg and arm when reach or extend just a certain angle or right after stepping out of bed in am. Also very up and down emotionally.
Comments: Any one else injected anywhere other than stomache having symptons??? No one sems to have any info for me.

Reason: Coumadin made my hair start to fall
Side Effects: Some bruises on my stomach but overall I love this drug and it's benefits

I started on 100mg daily once a day and experienced chest thightness_ nausea and depression. It is hard to tell if it's the medicine or the pregnancy_ I didn't felt depressed and all-day nausea with my first baby_ so I'm sure it's the medicine. Then they changed my dosis to 60mg twice a day and chest pain was gone_ but I'm back in the 100mg dosis and the chest pain is back.

Have been on Lovenox for 4 yrs. after failing coumadin.After bilateral P.E.'s they put the filter in and ever since have been on anti-coags and have felt terrible with flushing_ chest pain_ increased sweating_ heat intolerance_fatigue_ diarrhea_ etc.I wonder in I just shouldn't go off these blood thinners but I am afraid of the blood clots that can form around these filters.

Reason: protein s deficiency/ PE'S AND DVT
Side Effects: Hard knots in stomach as large as baseballs at times.very sore stomach most of time.I'm a life longer on this drug but while being on it and asprin still had a heart attack and stroke.I also have frequent tia's. I would like to hear from someone who is a lifer and any long term effects from this drug.
Both sides are very bruised & the right side is in extreme pain to touch.  I am having major anxiety to take another injection_ seem to have some depression also.
Comments: Make this in pill form!  I am not afraid of needles but the abdomen for injections is just not a normal site.  I was only able to inject myself twice before a family member had to do it for me.  I experienced much anxiety to self inject.

Side Effects: I have experienced headaces and migranes.  I got some brusing at the injection site.  I also get stompic pains along with some nausia.
Comments: I think it's a great drug.  I'm not sure if the side effects are because I have so many allergies. If someone can help please let me know. Thank You

Side Effects: Very sore stomach_ huge bruises around injection site. But I guess that is worth it when compared to the alternative (another DVT)

I had no problems with the injections_ but a week later I am experiencing a rash or hives on my stomach - which is where I gave myself the shots.  The rash is very itchy and it almost appears as if I have welts.
Comments: I am terrified of needles_ but I have to say that once I got past the fear_ it really wasn't a big deal.  The only pain was that the medicine stings for a few minutes.  The needles were very sharp.

Side Effects: Shots are painful_ hard spots around my waist_ but the stuff works.
Comments: Because of temperature requirements_ I am limited where I can travel with lovenox.

Side Effects: Chest tightness_ difficulty swallowing & breathing_ sore stomach_ anxiety_ depression.
Comments: I didn't have shortness of breath or chest tightness until I started Lovenox.  It also went away when I switched to Coumadin only.  I'm thankful I could go home instead of staying in the hospital with Heparin_ but I think I was a bit mislead about the potential side effects.  A few times I thought I was having a heart attack only to be told by my doctor that it was nothing to worry about.  It's a good drug_ just know what to expect.

Side Effects: Have had two open heart surgeries to replace the aorta valve.  Last surgery in 2005_ and have been on Coumadin since 1968 with no problems.  Scheduled for knee surgery and cardiologist prescribed Lovenox.  Questioned this since have never had to use it before_ but was told it's to prevent clots which can occur with knee/hip surgeries.  Took first injection had a mild headache - which was unusual since I don't get headaches often.  Next shot_ the headache continued so I called cardiologist who said it wasn't from the med.  Had headache every day..... end result - had brain surgery to remove large amounts of blood.  No one listened and no one cared.  Be loud_ be verbal_ and insist that someone listen to you.  My life has been forever changed.... and not for the better.

Reason: PE near Heart and Clotting disorder
Side Effects: Some pain with injection in the beginning.  Now none.
Comments: This drug has really been a godsend for me.  I took warfarin for 2 years and never was able to achieve level due to kidney disease.  In that time I also suffered multiple bone infracts.  Now all that has cleared and All I have to do is give myself a shot daily.  I'm happy

Side Effects: Pain & swelling at injection site_ bruising
Comments: Thank you lovenox!  After 8 miscarriages_ they figured out I have Antiphosolipid syndrome and I am currently 13 weeks with my baby.  Numb the injection site first and it makes the injection far more bearable.  We also found that taking the air out decreased the pain drastically!

Side Effects: slight bruising around injection site
Comments: I was originally put on Lovenox as a "bridge" until my Coumadin (warfarin) levels were therapeutic - but my INR never was correct_ so they've kept me on Lovenox. I admit_ the daily shots can seem daunting_ but it's better than dealing with coumadin and getting bloodwork everyweek to determine if the drug is actually working. This is so much easier - two shots a day and you're money!

Side Effects: Abdomen @ point of injection site bruses and hurts for a long peroid of time. Very sore abdomen.
Comments: Doc at hospital suggested drug and to have me self inject myself due to my age and rather good health. I broke my knee and ended up with blood clot. I am still taking injections and it seams to be working OK but very painful after you inject. Pain is a 5 to 6 at times on a scall of 10.

Side Effects: I went into anaphylactic shock on this drug!  I had at least 2 seizures_ and nearly died.  It began with nightmares_ then seizure; water standing on my body_ trouble breathing; loss of bladder control; milk and coffee tasted thick as syrup; metallic taste; weakness/faintness; fading of vision/light.
Comments: For me_ this is a very dangerous drug.  My doctor had only been using it for 2 months_(I suspect by way of 'incentives' from drug company)_ and because it was a holiday weekend_ he was unavailable to treat me or to tell me to get off the drug.

Side Effects: I have a burning sore throat_ off and on every day for 3 wks_ with a metallic taste and wonder if this is from the lovenox since I'm not taking anything else.  The injections are easy_ only bruise occasionally.
I took this due to having to get off Coumadin for surgery.  They made me feel depressed and sluggish.  The skin on my face became drier than normal_ and I had some flaky skin.
Severe leg and abdominal muscle cramps; lumps at injection site; pain from injections
Comments: The injections are just too much of a hassle_ and at some injection sites_ the fat breaks down and hardened spots on the abdomen result.  Also_ I've awaken with severe leg cramps that remain sore for days.  Also_ lots of bruising.  I tried Coumadin but because of extensive business travel couldn't regulate very well.

Reason: ADVANCED FACTOR V LEIDEN_ DVT & PE
Side Effects: AWFUL BRUISING AROUND INJECTION SITE. COLD SWEATS. ABDOMINAL PAIN.
Comments: LONG TERM EFFECTS INCLUDE OSTHIOPEROSIS...AND THAT IS BOTHERSOME BECAUSE I AM A LIFER ON THIS DRUG.

Side Effects: sore stomach and arms_ knots formed whenever i bumped into anything
Comments: helped prevent further blood clots but very sore after 1 month

Side Effects: I found Lovenox to bruise a lot less than Heparin which I found unbearable.  Heparin left huge bruises and when you're taking two a day you run out of room quickly.  I thought the Lovenox stung more but the decrease in bruising was well worth it.  I'm taking it again while on Depot Lupron therapy and its only for two weeks.  I am tired of it already!
Comments: 9 Months2 Weeks

Side Effects: The needles on the prepackaged were so dull!  We started using a fine gauge insulin needle/syringe and drastically reduced the injection pain and the bruising.
Comments: 9 months_ 2 weeks

Side Effects: terrible bruising_ pain when injecting
Comments: It's wonderful_ I wouldn't be able to have children with out it

Side Effects: very sore stomach
Comments: Need to be put in pill form! the medice worked!

Side Effects: very sore stomach
Comments: Need to be put in pill form! The medcine worked!

Side Effects: my stomach became very sore from all the needles and some of the lumps are still there 3 years later
Comments: needs to be in tablet form

Side Effects: bruising_ bleeding_ whelts_ chills
Comments: It would be more usefull in pill_ liquid_ transdermal_ or form other than injection.
